scripts.publish:latest: npm run clean && npm run build &&  lerna version --conventional-commits && lerna publish from-package && npm run fix-npm-next-tag
scripts.publish:next: npm run clean && npm run build &&  lerna version prerelease --preid next --conventional-commits && lerna publish from-package --dist-tag next
scripts.fix-npm-next-tag: lerna exec --no-bail --no-private --no-sort --stream -- '[ -n "$(npm v . dist-tags.next)" -a "$(npm v . dist-tags.next)" != "$(npm v . dist.tags.latest)" ] && npm dist-tag add ${LERNA_PACKAGE_NAME}@$(npm v . dist-tags.latest) next'
